column4: What would be a good way to shutdown a machine if it has been sitting at the GDM login for a certain amount of time? Could this be a job for cron? Or should I go another route?
(that's if you'll end up putting it in cron)

Yes, I know the command to shut down. I'm trying to figure out what is the best method for the system to determine WHEN to shut down. I need to be able to track idle time at login or something of the sort
